WHY WE SPLIT UP......
 
 
 She told me we couldn't afford the beer I like at $35.00 a case 
 and I'd have to quit drinking. 
 
 Then I caught her spending $65.00 on make-up,
 and I asked her how come I had to give up stuff
 and she didn't. 
 
 She said she needed the make-up to look pretty for me.
 
 I told her that's what the beer was for.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Why we split up.....
